product_name: ASICS GEL-Sayuri Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a feminine and fashionable design, the women's ASICS GEL-Sayuri Running Shoes are engineered to give you a lightweight, cushioned platform for your daily runs. Synthetic leather and mesh uppers are light and airy to keep your feet cool during long runs. Women-specific design offers a great fit while the minimalist construction will make you feel light on your feet. You'll enjoy a soft, cushioned ride, thanks to the rearfoot GEL cushioning system. Outsole of the ASICS GEL-Sayuri Running Shoes incorporate high-abrasion rubber for enhanced durability. Closeout.
short_description: With a feminine and fashionable design, the women's ASICS GEL-Sayuri Running Shoes are engineered to give you a lightweight, cushioned platform for your daily runs.
